channel.title: Payments on Ex Machina
channel.description: Recent content in Payments on Ex Machina

item.title: Can We Do Without Cash
item.description: This article was written shortly after the launch of UPI, India’s fast payment system. At the time no-one really knew how this new system was going to work and I had some fanciful dieas of what we could do to ensure that this new payments system did not go the way of those that have come before it.
